name: Brave Magician Ipomoea
description:
Controls: Left and Right arrow keys to move, Up arrow key or Z to jump, X to attack or interact, P to pause, M to mute.

I completely missed Ludum Dare 31 but the, "entire game on one screen," theme really intrigued me so I spent a couple of weeks making this weird little game inspired by the mazes that were always my favorite part of activity books/kid's menus when I was really little.

I had originally wanted to have all the enemies and traps on screen at the same time but flash was having none of it.

Downloadable versions of all my games are now available for windows here.

https://sigilcipher.itch.io/four-strange-games-by-sigil
